settings.title: The stress-free path to your dream workspace
settings.heading: Take complexity and cost out of furnishing your office. Branch combines well-designed, lasting products with easy planning and all-in-one installation.
settings.subheading: Or Learn About Our Process

settings.heading: Helping 300+ offices and thousands of home offices

settings.title: Read more about how Branch helps ambitious teams work their best

settings.heading: Speed, ease, and value done differently.
settings.text: We cut out middlemen, maintain a lean line of modular inventory, and add flexibility to save you up to 50% compared to premium office furniture of comparable quality.

settings.subtext: We use high-performing materials designed to withstand countless hours of everyday use.
Pay for what you need, and nothing you don’t. No hidden fees or middlemen markups.
Whether you need your space furnished in two weeks or two months, we’ll help you get there.
Never lift a finger. We’ll handle it all, from delivery and install to building COIs and clean-up.

settings.heading: Focus on your work. We take care of the furniture.
settings.subheading: We want to make it easy for you. Let us take care of everything so you can focus on the things you enjoy.

settings.title: Branch, for
settings.sub_title: We work hard to ensure that every team finds a fit for their needs, regardless of industry. Explore Our solutions for building, vendors, and creators.
